item.title: Bob Marley - Guava Jelly - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Guava Jelly by Bob Marley from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Colbie Caillat - I Do - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song I Do by Colbie Caillat from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Asus4, Bm, Bm7, C♯7, D, Dm7, E, F♯m.

item.description: Play along video for the song Every Teardrop is a Waterfall by Coldplay from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, C♯m7, D, E, F♯m.
